item.description:
I'm trying something new.

On Sunday April 19th I am hosting a meetup of my Creative Peoples group and I thought it would be fun to ask if some of you would like to join us - we always have a great time talking about our creative interests, be it photography, digital art, sculpture, jewelry making, quilting etc..

There's a new space that's become available on Newbury street for Meetups, the Digital Lounge at Tech Superpowers and I think it bodes well for this group as there are a whole bunch of Macs for viewing slideshows, machines with Aperture, Lightroom, Photoshop, free wifi, cold sodas and a great stereo system and large flat screen.

The Tech Superpowers Digital Lounge holds about 15 people comfortably so I need to cap the RSVP's at 10 from each group, and get a few extra chairs and we should do fine. Plan on picking something up to munch on (there are many places nearby as well as a great new organic coffee place next door) We will have the Lounge from 5-8 PM.

The space is being offered free by Tech Superpowers for a limited time and there will be a TSP staff person on hand for the event who I'd like to tip, so I'm asking for $3 per person which includes a free cold soda/water from their cooler if you like.

So burn a CD and show off your work! Don't forget your business cards!

See you then!

Paul
item.how_to_find_us: We will have the place to ourselves!
item.name: Meet, Greet, Show & Tell
